p: Population structure was assessed using Structure 2.2 [ 46]. The admixture model and correlated allele frequencies between populations were selected as specified [ 47] to determine the number of genetic clusters ( K) best fitting the data. The length of the burn-in period was 100,000 runs followed by 500,000 Markov Chain Monte Carlo. Ten iterations were performed for each value of K from 1 to 15. K was determined graphically based on log likelihood values as previously described [ 46] using the web-based program Structure Harvester [ 48]. In addition, the Î”K method [ 49] was used to determine the best value of K. Finally, Clumpp 1.1.2 [ 50] and R 3.1.2 were used to produce graphical outputs for the inferred population structure.
